_header: Robin sat on good green hill
_description: Robert Henryson, ‘Robene and Makyne’ — sixteen 8-line stanzas

Banna.First Lines: Robene sat on gud grene hillKepand a flok of fe…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Kepand his hind vnder a hucheAmangis the holtis
                    hair
Banna.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcription, London,  British Library Addit. 30371, f.
                    77.
